ygData.msgSnippet: (Maaaybe, just maaaaybe, the IGL will have to be postponed.  It all depends. You see, my brother used his computer and mine that are networked to play Diablo 2

(Maaaybe, just maaaaybe, the IGL will have to be postponed.  It all depends.  
You see, my brother used his computer and mine that are networked to play 
Diablo 2 with his best friend.  Then they installed Freespace 2 and were 
trying to delete unuseful stuff on my computer, and they accidentally deleted 
some important stuff and my computer has 16 bit color.  So now he's going to 
reformat it, and I don't know how long that will take.  Supposedly just 40 
minutes, but I don't know if my files will still be intact.

So, just letting you know.  I'll post from my dad's computer until mine is 
fixed.  The IGL is NOT, NOT postponed, there is  just a slight possibility)

--part1_3d.e624098.2882129e_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
